channel.title: Twitter / BlackBerry
channel.description: Twitter updates from Research In Motion / BlackBerry.

item.title: BlackBerry: @KelHolden Have you checked out what's coming with #BlackBerry10?http://t.co/7pwwxZlN It'll definitely be worth the wait: ^KB

item.title: BlackBerry: @mwloos It will definitely be worth the wait, Mike! What feature will check out first when you get your hands on #BlackBerry10? ^KB

item.title: BlackBerry: @Ridgepointwines Well, at least #BlackBerry10 launch is right around the corner. Let the countdown begin! :) ^KB
item.description: BlackBerry: @Ridgepointwines Well, at least #BlackBerry10 launch is right around the corner. Let the countdown begin! :) ^KB

item.title: BlackBerry: Tweet about ur #BlackBerry10 excitement in a 10-word story for a chance at evening #BlackBerry10TO tix (must be in attendance to win) ^MM

item.title: BlackBerry: How are your New Year’s resolutions coming along, #TeamBlackBerry? Keep us updated & we’ll try to keep YOU motivated. ^KB

item.title: BlackBerry: @_Brittope We're sorry to hear this. If you explain the problem you are having to @BlackBerryHelp, they may be able to assist. ^KB
